title: Today's picks: From Titan to Hindalco, hot stocks to watch on Thursday
content: Nifty, Bank Nifty, Titan, Tech Mahindra, Hindalco
contentSnippet: Nifty, Bank Nifty, Titan, Tech Mahindra, Hindalco

article.title: Today's picks: From Titan to Hindalco, hot stocks to watch on Thursday
article.content:
Nifty

Current: 10,685 (fut: 10,690) Target: NA

Stop-long positions at 10,620. Stop-short positions at 10,760. Big moves could go

till 10,800, 10,575. A long 10,600p (84), short 10,500p (58) could gain 10-15 if the index tests 10,625.

Bank Nifty

Current: 26,368 (futures: 26,383)

Target: NA

Stop-long positions at 26,250. Stop-short positions at 26,500. Big moves could go till 26,000, 26,750. The trend still looks negative.

Titan

Current price: Rs 900

Target price: Rs 920

Keep a stop at Rs 892 and go long.

Add to the position between Rs 910

and Rs 915. Book profits at Rs 920.

Tech Mahindra

Current price: Rs 692

Target price: Rs 705

Keep a stop at Rs 686 and go long.

Add to the position between Rs 700

and Rs 702. Book profits at Rs 705.

Hindalco

Current price: Rs 248

Target price: Rs 244

Keep a stop at Rs 251 and go short.

Add to the position between Rs 245

and Rs 246. Book profits at Rs 244.

Target prices, projected movements in terms of next session, unless otherwise stated
